arts.ttl: Livingston vs Falkirk predictions: Livi look good to continue getting the better of the Bairns
arts.sum: Falkirk beat Livingston to top spot in last season's Scottish Championship but Livi dominated their head-to-head and Jack Ogalbe expects them to grab another victory at Almondvale.Â

Both Livingston and Falkirk were playing in the Scottish Championship last season, and both teams enjoyed four goal thrillers upon their return to the top flight on the opening day. Livingston haven'...
